item.title: By: Noah Clements
item.dc:creator: Noah Clements
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2019/05/21/productivity/#comment-14986">Scrofano Law PC</a>.
I agree. I often have to psyche myself into it though by listing the things I just did. Deal with big deal emergency - Check!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Scrofano Law PC.

I agree. I often have to psyche myself into it though by listing the things I just did. Deal with big deal emergency – Check!

item.title: By: Scrofano Law PC
item.dc:creator: Scrofano Law PC
item.description: Great post! I find to do lists can be very helpful in running my criminal law practice. Sometimes checking off small tasks help me build momentum into feeling productive and getting more done.
item.content:encoded: Great post! I find to do lists can be very helpful in running my criminal law practice. Sometimes checking off small tasks help me build momentum into feeling productive and getting more done.
